amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to ensure sufficient funds for the Department of Veterans Affairs Inspector General to provide rigorous oversight of the Washington, D.C. Veterans Affairs Medical Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Connolly.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
